name: Vegan Jalebi
description: Jalebi is an Indian Sweet which is basically deep fried batter in pretzel kind of shape and dipped in sugar syrup
recipeIngredient: just about 1/2 cup luke warm water
orange food color (optional.. I did not use color)

recipeInstructions.text: To prepare the sugar syrup, Boil all the ingredients till the syrup comes to a boil and thickens a bit. (2-3 minutes after the syrup boils). You can add other flavors to the syrup like kewra essence or rose water/essence instead of cardamom.
recipeInstructions.name: To prepare the sugar syrup, Boil all the ingredients till the syrup comes to a boil and thickens a bit. (2-3 minutes after the syrup boils). You can add other flavors to the syrup like kewra essence or rose water/essence instead of cardamom.

recipeInstructions.text: For the Jalebi batter, In a bowl, add warm water, sugar, saffron and yeast and mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: For the Jalebi batter, In a bowl, add warm water, sugar, saffron and yeast and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Keep the mixture for 10 minutes or until it is frothy.
recipeInstructions.name: Keep the mixture for 10 minutes or until it is frothy.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the flour, non dairy yogurt and mix well to make a smooth pouring consistency mixture without lumps.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the flour, non dairy yogurt and mix well to make a smooth pouring consistency mixture without lumps.

recipeInstructions.text: Cover bowl with plastic wrap and keep for an hour.
recipeInstructions.name: Cover bowl with plastic wrap and keep for an hour.

recipeInstructions.text: Pour the mixture into a squeezy bottle or a zip-lock bag and cut a small hole(1/8 inch) on one side of the ziplock bag,
recipeInstructions.name: Pour the mixture into a squeezy bottle or a zip-lock bag and cut a small hole(1/8 inch) on one side of the ziplock bag,

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a kadhai or deep pan over medium heat until hot. Starting from the center, squeeze out the batter in circles to make a big concentric circle.
recipeInstructions.name: Heat oil in a kadhai or deep pan over medium heat until hot. Starting from the center, squeeze out the batter in circles to make a big concentric circle.

recipeInstructions.text: Fry it on medium high heat on both sides, till the Jalebies turn golden brown. (*Authentic Jalebis are meant to be fried in ghee(clarified butter), like are you kidding me, 2 cups of ghee is probably from 100s of gallons of milk! )
recipeInstructions.name: Fry it on medium high heat on both sides, till the Jalebies turn golden brown. (*Authentic Jalebis are meant to be fried in ghee(clarified butter), like are you kidding me, 2 cups of ghee is probably from 100s of gallons of milk! )

recipeInstructions.text: Transfer Jalebis to warm sugar syrup and remove after half a minute.
recipeInstructions.name: Transfer Jalebis to warm sugar syrup and remove after half a minute.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve warm or cold as is or topped with Vegan Rabdi!
recipeInstructions.name: Serve warm or cold as is or topped with Vegan Rabdi!
